summary:
With more then 35 years experience in the offshore & onshore occupational health, industrial hygiene and global public health management, pharmaceutical industry and at a clinical level as a physician, occupational health advisor working both with national oil companies(PERTAMINA), government organization(Ministry of Health & Ministry of Manpower) in Indonesia, Timor Leste and the Netherlands several multinational & international offshore oil & energy companies(YPF, IIAPCO, MAXUS, REPSOL, CNOOC, ARII, BP, TOTAL, CALTEX-CHEVRON, UNION TEXAS, UNION OIL, MARATHON, GULF, KODECO, HUFFCO, CONOCO, HUDBAY, MOBIL OIL), oil drilling and exploration companies( ZAPATA, SANTA FEE, PENROD, DUAL, IOC) in providing Health, Safety and Environment(HSE), Disaster and Emergency Relief  services and also experienced in working as a medical officer with several global international organizations such as the United Nations(UN),United Nations Volunteers(UNV) & Agencies(UNDP, UNICEF, WHO, ILO) to support UN security & peace keeping missions, non profit/non-governmental organizations in Indonesia, Netherlands, Afghanistan,Timor Leste and Worldwide.

With my international experience, profession and educational background in medicine, occupational and global public health, industrial hygiene, pharmaceutical industry, geriatric nursing & care, independent translator, military training in supporting the oil & energy industry and international security & peace keeping missions I am more then available and ready to serve you globally to support your multinational, multicultural and international team player anywhere and everywhere all over the world continents.
